body.content:
My Dear Oswald in the Lord Jesus,

Thanks for being concerned about my health and May the Good Lord Bless you
as we do this project together in Jesus name AMEN. I am writing you this
message from my Heart and I want you to know that before I contacted you, I
have prayed And Fasted to God almighty for him to Lead me to the rightfully
person that will Help me fulfill my last Wishes on earth and I believe he
has directed me to you. I have been serving God before I developed this
sickness, and I was asked to go back to my country for better treatment.
But it has not been easy for me to carry things as I plan them due to my
Health most especially now that This Cancer has spread all over my Body. I
found it very difficult to accomplish My Mission on earth before I go back
to meet my God in Heaven.

More so, have it in mind that I am alone in the hospital and ever since I
was brought back from Malaysia to Scotland, everybody that claimed to be my
well-wishers has departed from me simply because when they all heard the
Cancer has affected my Whole body and my late husband relatives Also denied
me as well because I was not able to bear any child for my late husband
after the death of our only child that is why I am finding it too hard to
accomplish my mission here on earth and I hope my trust and believing in
you won't be in vain.

My late husband's relatives are wishing me death because all they are
Concerned about is my late husband's wealth. They want me to die so that
they can Be able to claim all that my late husband left behind before He
died, Simply because I had no child for my late Husband and they Called me
all sort of names, Like (BARREN WOMEN), they even said that killed my
husband but only God can bear me witness because God knows I cannot kill. I
want you to claim this fund and use it to help the Poor and less privileged
in your country. Instead of my late husband Relatives to access to this
fund I would rather hand it over to you to take Care of the fund and also
help people who desire help. Because if This Fund gets to my late husband's
relatives, they will misuse the fund. I am doing this because the doctor
told me that I would not live for long after my surgery, so I decided to
use this fund to help the poor.

I have received several messages from the *CIMB Bank Berhad Malaysia* for
me to send someone I can entrust My funds to, before my operation commence
and since everybody around me is just After my downfall and how they can
get my funds and use it for worldly purpose I have Decided to pray to God
Almighty for him to help me choose one of his faithful servant To assist me
in fulfilling my last wishes. Please I really need your trust and mercy
because I am entrusting you with all my suffering and pains and it will be
a great pleasure if you can help me fulfill my wish to the very end. I
believe God almighty will see me through my operation which is coming up
next two week to enable me to see you person to person in the future and I
will be very glad if you keep me in prayers.

The Director of the Bank who is my account officer also mailed me and asked
me to look for a relation which I trust with my heart to claim my funds
before the Malaysia Government claim's it as an unclaimed fund. I don't
have anybody to call my relatives because my late husband Relative, whom I
was supposed to depend on, has turned their back on me, and this fund is in
fixed deposit. I don't want the government to claim my fund. That is why I
want to use the fund to help the less privileged and poor people in your
country through you.

Below are my bank details which I want you to use to contact my bank after
reading this message.




**BANK NAME: CIMB BANK BERHAD MALAYSIA*CONTACT PERSON: MR. DATO ABDUL
RAHMAN AHMAD*POSITION: Group CHIEF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR*CONTACT EMAIL:
 official-dato@yandex.ru <official-dato@yandex.ru>*
**MOBILE/WHATSAPP PHONE NUMBER: +601137075697*

Kindly Keep this transaction very private and confidential and make sure
that you deal directly with Mr. Dato Abdul Rahman Ahmad, because only
through him can you be able to get my funds transferred to you without any
delay. For your clear confirmation, I have enclosed here a scanned copy of
my Pictures in the Hospital. The Purpose of enclosing the picture was to
enable you to forward it across to the Bank where the Fund is deposited and
they will tell you what to do next and I want you to give me an update on
what they told you to do.

Lastly, below are my full Account details. I would like you to forward them
to the Bank And Let them know that I have instructed you to claim my fund
and let them know you Are giving them the details for Verification.











**Name of the Bank: CIMB BANK BERHAD MALAYSIA.*Depositor's Name: Mrs.
Margaret Bennett.*Account Name: Mrs. Margaret Bennett.*Account
Number: 00209878777*Batch Number: 66840090040*Year Deposited: 2002*Secret
question: What is my husband's Last Name?*Answer: Bennett*Security
Code: 90600040020*Currency: Great Britain Pounds.*Amount: (£5,000,000.00
GP) * *($6,926,475.00 usd**)*

Hope my trust and belief in you won’t be in vain because I wouldn't want to
be cheated at the same time while I go through pain in the Hospital. And I
hopefully believe if I survive my surgery, I would like to come over to
your country to see your humble work for the Lord.

Please keep praying for me and keep me posted on any information you get
from the Bank. I will like you to give me your telephone number and contact
address in your next Email to enable telephone conversation with you and
the Management of the Bank where I deposited my fund, So that I can let
them know that you are my relative and I would like the fund to be
Transferred to you without any further delay since I am ill and have Short
time to spend on earth as I cannot continue this transaction that is why I
have appointed you to help me out to fulfill my wish.

I hope to read from you again in good faith, Remain blessed in God. Love
and Peace of the Lord be with you, now and forever. Amen.

Warmest Regards,

*Mrs. Margaret Bennett*

header.subject: My Dear Blessed Siju Thomas, Please contact Mr. Dato Abdul Rahman Ahmad with his details listed below,
